snippet.title: ELVERA | Official Trailer [Early Access]
snippet.description:
This indie game, crafted single-handedly with dedication, is a testament to more than one year journey fueled by passion.

⏳ Download now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2018820/Elvera/

🗨️ Discord: https://discord.gg/cgvfesQs3g
🐦 Twitter: https://twitter.com/ElveraGame

📸 Developer's Portfolio: https://www.martinmusil.com
👋🏼 Developer's LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/muskadev/

Thank you for your support and for being part of the community!

#ELVERA #IndieGames #GamingCommunity #FreeToPlay #EarlyAccess #RPG
